请只对密码使用拉丁字母和数字

Passphrases add an additional security layer to the wallets, enabling users to create multiple independent multi-coin wallets using a single mnemonic recovery phrase, but associated with different passwords. \n\nTo restore these wallets, a user will require a mnemonic recovery phrase as well as a password for each to be restored wallet.
希望Unstoppable钱包？请抽点时间评价此应用
Enter your mnemonic which consists of between 12 and 24 words. The words need to be entered in the correct order and separated by spaces.
Wrong words count. It must be between 12 and 24 words. You entered: %d
Enter the passphrase you used when creating this mnemonic phrase.
If you know your birthday height of wallet enter it for quick syncing.

The historical change in ratio between the market cap of Bitcoin to the rest of the cryptocurrency markets. \n\nTypically, when Bitcoin dominance is trending higher, the rest of the crypto market trends downwards and vice versa.

The historical change in cumulative market value of tokens in Decentralized Finance sector.

您必须在接收%s之前先备份%s钱包。
您还没有任何钱包。创建新钱包或恢复已有钱包

时间锁定只能和P2PKH地址（以1开头）一起使用
Unstoppable不支持对透明地址付款
Sending to yourself is not supported
比特币和 Etherum区块链都要求用户在发送交易时支付网络费用。 当网络上发生大量交易时，费用较高，而区块链不那么繁忙时，费用较低。
Selecting a value from this range may result in a transaction being held as pending for hours, or being rejected. The lower the value, the longer it will take for the transaction to confirm.
Typically, the recommended fee value should be sufficient for a transaction to be processed within minutes or an hour for Bitcoin and within minutes for Ethereum.

For transactions where priority is important, we recommend using the high fee value. It\'s expected to be sufficient for a transaction to be completed within 10 minutes for Bitcoin and within 1-2 minutes for Ethereum.
点击批准，表示您允许此应用查看您的公开地址。这是保护您的数据免受潜在钓鱼风险威胁的重要安全步骤。
您可以前往浏览器。在浏览器中进行交互时不要关闭此页面。
Failed to establish connection. Try reconnecting again.
请对消息签名以便进行验证
The current %s balance is below the amount required to process this transaction, including the transaction fee.
选定的费用值太低，将被拒绝！
Error! Check balance and ensure there is enough %s to cover fee. Or try increasing price slippage amount and try again. Will retry in 3 sec…
The difference between the market price and expected settlement price is too high.
Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage
Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
在兑换操作之后，金额将转移至指定地址
Slippage Tolerance can’t be more than %s%%
您应为智能合约授予权限，以代表您互兑给定的代币。此权限设定了智能合约可以使用的金额。它不会影响您的余额，但需要小额费用以执行批准交易。\n\n虽然这可以在每一次交易之前按需完成，但是预先对将来的交易批准较大的金额将使成本更低。
您已经有了此金额的限额

This exchange service is powered by %s, a decentralized token exchange protocol built on the %s blockchain. \n\n%s is fully automated and managed by smart contracts that facilitate token exchanges in a reliable manner without any means to cheat.
The amount of currency that service can spend on your behalf when executing token swaps. A sufficient allowance is required before a swap action can take place.
The expected price deviation from a shown price, typically increases with the swap amount.
A service fee for the swap action on the platform, shown in the currency the user sells. For most orders it should be either 0.3 % or 0.6 %.
一名用户因为互兑操作将收到的最小金额。
一名用户因为互兑操作将收到的最大金额。
%s区块链上给定交易的预计处理成本。%s相关交易的成本通常会高于通用代币转账交易。
Transactions with a higher transaction fee will result in faster processing speeds. The opposite is true as well.
您还没有任何待定或成功的交易
交易已发送至自有地址

The transaction has not been confirmed on the blockchain yet. Transactions sent with a recommended or higher fee setting are generally processed within 10 minutes. Transactions sent with a low fee may remain pending for a few hours or even days, and can even be rejected entirely.

The transaction has been already included in the blockchain but has not reached permanent finality. At this point, it\'s safe to consider the transaction as completed for smaller payments. For larger payments, it\'s recommended to wait until the transaction status changes to completed.
交易已完成并被视为永久和不可逆。

The transaction did not get processed and no value transfer took place. Transactions with a fail status are still written to the blockchain and consume transaction fees. The Unstoppable app is unable to show the fail reason for such transactions, but users are able to look it up themselves on a public block explorer i.e. etherscan.io.

This action will attempt to invalidate previous transaction by resending it with a higher fee. If the original transaction remains pending when a new one sent there is s a high chance (not guaranteed) that it will be invalidated and replaced. Only one of these two transactions will be included in the blockchain.

This action will attempt to invalidate previous transaction by resending as a new 0 %s transaction to self. If the original transaction remains pending when a new one sent there is s a high chance (not guaranteed) that it will be invalidated and replaced. Only one of these two transactions will be included in the blockchain.

The sender sent these funds with a spending lock that will expire on %s.\n\nNo worries, the received Bitcoins are already yours, but until the lock period expires you can not spend them on the Bitcoin network.
Double Spend Risk! There is another transaction on the blockchain that is trying to spend inputs used in this transaction. Only one transaction will be accepted by the network

The exchange rate data is provided by a third party service - Coingecko.com.\n\nThe Unstoppable wallet app doesn\'t guarantee these values are always correct and matches market data. The chance for inconsistency is higher if you select any base currency other than %s.
虽然此APP不会将您的个人数据提供给任何第三方，但您的某些个人数据（例如IP地址）在与区块链通信时可能会泄漏。单击右上角的“信息”按钮以获取更多详细信息。
Select a data source for restoring a wallet with transactions
通过改变交易结构的方式使您的BTC、LTC、BCH交易更难被追踪。
Below you will find a detailed explanation of the privacy settings that are available in the app. It\'s safe to consider them as settings for those that require extensive privacy.

This setting controls the privacy level of user's transactions on Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash and Litecoin blockchains. 

Most Bitcoin transactions generate two outputs. One output is the amount that goes to the receiver and the other is the change output that is returned to the sender. The way most wallets construct transactions makes it easy for a third party monitoring Bitcoin blockchain to understand which of the outputs went to the receiving party and which one was the change amount returned to the sender. The output returned to the sender can then be used in future transactions and further reveal the details to the monitoring party. 

Unstoppable wallet implements measures to makes it significantly harder to figure out which output goes where. There are two options available to Unstoppable users: 

1. Shuffle : The order of transaction outputs are randomized on every transaction. Sometimes change can be the first output, sometimes it can be the second. If a user trusts the developer of the app, than consider this a recommended option. 

2. Deterministic : There is a commonly agreed standard for ordering transaction outputs (known as BIP69). In open source wallets that standard ensures that wallet users do not need to trust how developers of the app implement the ordering of the outputs. As this standard is new, not many wallets have implemented it yet. As a result, it's somewhat possible to see on the blockchain whether transaction was sent from the wallet that uses that standard or not.

This setting controls how this app interacts with blockchains when sending or receiving transactions. 

In the case of Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, and Dash, the communication with blockchain network nodes is fully peer-to-peer. Unstoppable pings many nodes and communicates with one of them. Each time the app connects to a different node. 

In the case of Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain, there are no alternatives for mobile wallets to interact with respective blockchains other than via third-party RPC service providers (i.e. Infura.io) or personal Ethereum nodes. That essentially means your communication with that blockchain is not decentralized. This doesn't impact your funds in any way, only the ability to connect to the blockchain network.

This setting is only relevant when restoring an existing wallet. It is a process of getting transactions history for a given coin so that the wallet app is able to display past transactions and calculate user's balance. This needs to happen only once, when user restores previously created wallet. At this point there are two potential ways for a mobile wallet like Unstoppable to do this: 

1. from API Server : There is a third-party predefined server which hosts the entire blockchain and has all the data processed and ready to provide it in a fast manner. This method is fast but can potentially keep track of the IP addresses and the data requested. This option is recommended due to its speed of getting data (5-10 minutes). The risks are minimal. If the user restoring from his own server then no privacy risks at all. 

2. from Blockchain : In this case the app tries to restore directly from a p2p network of the blockchain nodes. The app pings many of those nodes and requests data from them. Potentially these nodes can keep track of user's IP address and requests made however during restore the app can switch between nodes. There are close to 10,000 Bitcoin nodes on the network at any given time. This option is slow and can easily take 2-3 hours, app needs to be open while restore is happening...
启用生物认证会削弱设备的整体安全性（PIN码更安全）
此操作将重新启动Unstoppable钱包。
使用此应用的同时让您的网络完全匿名化。请注意，在某些情况下，DeFi应用的WalletConnect功能可能非常慢或根本不起作用。
The notifications for the Unstoppable Wallet app are disabled. You need to turn on Notifications and allow background app refresh in order to be able to receive price change alerts.

The Unstoppable wallet is built for those looking to invest and store cryptocurrencies in a private and independent manner. 

It's a non-custodial, peer-to-peer wallet where only the user has control over the funds. It doesn't collect any data and keeps the user independent by not locking the user's funds to a specific wallet app. 

The Unstoppable wallet is fully open-source and anyone can confirm the app works exactly as it claims to. 

We built Unstoppable for ourselves as the other available solutions were not up to par. Both from an engineering and usability perspective, we believe this wallet to be significantly ahead of alternative products.
我浏览了此应用的“学院”（Academy）部分并掌握了储存加密货币的基础知识。
我已对我钱包的私钥备份，该私钥以12-24字的格式展示给我。我理解这些私钥将保存在我的智能手机而不是其他地方。
I understand that passing my phone to untrusted entities and leaving the wallet app without a safe PIN lock may potentially endanger the safety of my funds.
I understand that jail breaking (rooting) my phone, installing third party apps from unknown sources, and keeping the operating system outdated can potentially endanger the safety of my funds.
I understand there may be undiscovered software issues in the code powering this wallet app, which may potentially lead to unexpected behavior or the app malfunctioning.

I understand that I will need my private keys in order to restore access to my funds should I lose my phone or if the app malfunctions. Without my private keys, it will be impossible to recover access to my wallet.

I understand that disabling the phone unlock PIN(or its equivalent) in Settings of Android OS will erase the wallet\'s private keys from my device. I will need my private keys to regain access to my funds.
I understand that only I myself am responsible for the safety of my funds, and no other entity.
感谢您选择我们的钱包！

Set price change alerts for the coins you would like to watch.

You will be alerted when the change in price for the last 24 hours exceeds the selected threshold.

Price Trend Alert warns of a trend change for the short 1 week, for the long 6 month.
已禁用Unstoppable钱包应用通知。您必须开启通知并允许后台应用刷新才能接收价格变更警报。
收款人要求在转账交易中包含非空的备注
No results found. Try to add token manually if you know its smart contract address.

The features below are experimental and should be used with caution. While we have thoroughly tested these features using our own crypto funds, we cannot guarantee they will work as expected in all possible cases.

This enables you to send Bitcoins that cannot be spent until a specified date. 

The receiver of such transactions should use the Unstoppable wallet app version 0.10 or newer, with the BIP44 address format for Bitcoin. 

Only the Unstoppable wallet can correctly identify such transactions on the Bitcoin network, as well as enable the receiver to spend those Bitcoins after the lock period expires. 

If you’re a HODLer, you may use this feature to force yourself into hodling your Bitcoins by sending such transactions to yourself. 

Being an experimental feature, the maximum amount per transaction is limited to 0.5 BTC.
Tip! Restoring an existing wallet but with a new passphrase will generate a brand new wallet. This is handy if you want to use a single 12-24 word mnemonic recovery phrase for multiple wallets.
您应该在将此钱包的私钥从该手机删除之前先对其进行备份。

If you didn\'t backup the private key for this wallet, you will lose access to your funds.

Transactions with this token are fully public allowing 3rd party services to link different transactions to the same entity, see amounts transacted and view user balances.
Transactions with this token are semi-anonymous. A 3rd party service is able to see the amounts transacted and partially link different transactions to the same entity.
Transactions with this token are anonymous by default or provide such capabilities. No entity is able to link different transactions to the same individual or see the amounts transacted.
The amount of tokens in circulation can potentially be increased or decreased by a centralized entity at will.
The amount of tokens in circulation controlled by an algorithm and works in a deterministic manner outside of centralized influence.
The tokens can\'t be confiscated when kept in a non-custodial wallet.
The tokens can be confiscated or tampered with by an issuing entity.
The token holder can\'t be censored from transacting.
The token holder can be censored from transacting.
The project had its code audited from external entity, either fully or partially. The presence of the audit doesn\'t mean that project is risk free and not doesn\'t have any exploits risks.
The project had its code audited from external entity, either fully or partially. The presence of the audit doesn\'t mean that project is risk free and not doesn\'t have any exploits risks.
